review: I have used this device for around 3 months and generally it has performed OK. However for some reason Google have decided to sabotage it and render it uselss.To begin with, it's a neat little device. It's easy to set up, it's inexpensive and it runs a pretty slideshow when it's idle. It is also useful for streaming tabs to - these tabs can be web pages or video. I use it most of the day to stream Bloomberg TV from bloomberg.com and for that it works perfectly.So why only 2 stars? Well, it's because I wish it had just been left to do the above. The problem with the device is that whenever you want to stream a tab for Youtube, Netflix or BBC iPlayer, the device decides to run its own native application instead of just casting the chrome tab - and they never, ever work. The tab will just freeze and the device will say 'waiting to cast'.It's infuriating. I have tried factory resetting the device 3 times. I've tried a new device. They all have the same issue.I'm not technically illiterate either. I have run an managed IT services business for over 10 years.I don't see why there isn't an option to override the poorly written apps and just cast tabs as it's supposed to. If they introduced that function, the device would again be useful and I will change the rating to 5 stars.
